verses.verse: Then I-yov <WH347> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>,
I know <WH3045> <WH8804> that thou canst do <WH3201> <WH8799> every thing, and that no thought <WH4209> can be withholden <WH1219> <WH8735> from thee.

Who is he that hideth <WH5956> <WH8688> counsel <WH6098> without knowledge <WH1847>? therefore have I uttered <WH5046> <WH8689> that I understood <WH995> <WH8799> not; things too wonderful <WH6381> <WH8737> for me, which I knew <WH3045> <WH8799> not.
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, I beseech thee, and I will speak <WH1696> <WH8762>: I will demand <WH7592> <WH8799> of thee, and declare <WH3045> <WH8685> thou unto me.
I have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> of thee by the hearing <WH8088> of the ear <WH241>: but now mine eye <WH5869> seeth <WH7200> <WH8804> thee.
Wherefore I abhor <WH3988> <WH8799> myself, and repent <WH5162> <WH8738> in dust <WH6083> and ashes <WH665>.

And it was so, that after <WH310> the YY <WH3068> had spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> these words <WH1697> unto I-yov <WH347>, the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> to Eliphaz <WH464> the Temanite <WH8489>, My wrath <WH639> is kindled <WH2734> <WH8804> against thee, and against thy two <WH8147> friends <WH7453>: for ye have not spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> of me the thing that is right <WH3559> <WH8737>, as my servant <WH5650> I-yov <WH347> hath.

Therefore take <WH3947> <WH8798> unto you now seven <WH7651> bullocks <WH6499> and seven <WH7651> rams <WH352>, and go <WH3212> <WH8798> to my servant <WH5650> I-yov <WH347>, and offer up <WH5927> <WH8689> for yourselves a burnt offering <WH5930>; and my servant <WH5650> I-yov <WH347> shall pray <WH6419> <WH8691> for you: for him <WH6440> will I accept <WH5375> <WH8799>: lest I deal <WH6213> <WH8800> with you after your folly <WH5039>, in that ye have not spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> of me the thing which is right <WH3559> <WH8737>, like my servant <WH5650> I-yov <WH347>.

So Eliphaz <WH464> the Temanite <WH8489> and Bildad <WH1085> the Shuhite <WH7747> and Zophar <WH6691> the Naamathite <WH5284> went <WH3212> <WH8799>, and did <WH6213> <WH8799> according as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH1696> <WH8765> them: the YY <WH3068> also accepted <WH5375> <WH8799> I-yov <WH6440> <WH347>.

And the YY <WH3068> turned <WH7725> <WH8804> the captivity <WH7622> <WH8675> <WH7622> of I-yov <WH347>, when he prayed <WH6419> <WH8692> for his friends <WH7453>: also the YY <WH3068> gave <WH3254> <WH8686> I-yov <WH347> twice as much <WH4932> as he had before.

Then came <WH935> <WH8799> there unto him all his brethren <WH251>, and all his sisters <WH269>, and all they that had been of his acquaintance <WH3045> <WH8802> before <WH6440>, and did eat <WH398> <WH8799> bread <WH3899> with him in his house <WH1004>: and they bemoaned <WH5110> <WH8799> him, and comforted <WH5162> <WH8762> him over all the evil <WH7451> that the YY <WH3068> had brought <WH935> <WH8689> upon him: every man <WH376> also gave <WH5414> <WH8799> him a <WH259> piece of money <WH7192>, and every one <WH376> an earring <WH5141> of gold <WH2091>.

So the YY <WH3068> blessed <WH1288> <WH8765> the latter end <WH319> of I-yov <WH347> more than his beginning <WH7225>: for he had fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> thousand <WH505> sheep <WH6629>, and six <WH8337> thousand <WH505> camels <WH1581>, and a thousand <WH505> yoke <WH6776> of oxen <WH1241>, and a thousand <WH505> she asses <WH860>.
He had also seven <WH7658> sons <WH1121> and three <WH7969> daughters <WH1323>.

And he called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of the first <WH259>, Jemima <WH3224>; and the name <WH8034> of the second <WH8145>, Kezia <WH7103>; and the name <WH8034> of the third <WH7992>, Kerenhappuch <WH7163>.

And in all the land <WH776> were no women <WH802> found <WH4672> <WH8738> so fair <WH3303> as the daughters <WH1323> of I-yov <WH347>: and their father <WH1> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> their brethren <WH251>.

After <WH310> this lived <WH2421> <WH8799> I-yov <WH347> an hundred <WH3967> and forty <WH705> years <WH8141>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799> his sons <WH1121>, and his sons <WH1121> ' sons <WH1121>, even four <WH702> generations <WH1755>.
So I-yov <WH347> died <WH4191> <WH8799>, being old <WH2205> and full <WH7649> of days <WH3117>.
